Questions.Question: Solve the given equation for y: $4y = 8z(\frac{2}{3}y - 2x) + 6z$.
A movie tickets cost \$15. Your friend paid \$100 for some tickets. There was a an overall service charge of \$10. How many tickets did your friend buy?
Complete the equation $2(x + 3) + x = 3x + __$ so that it has infinitely many solutions.
Complete the equation $2(x + 3) + x = 3x + __$ so that it has no solutions.
Questions.Answer: $2(x + 3) + x = 3x + c$, where c can be any number apart from 6
